docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, June 20--On June 9th the Argentine Government authorized Col. J. Filomeno Velazco, chief of the Federal police, to announce that within one week all political prisoners would be released except the extreme Rightists.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, June 20--On June 9th the Argentine Government authorized Col. J. Filomeno Velazco, chief of the Federal police, to announce that within one week all political prisoners would be released except the extreme Rightists.

docs.snippet: WITHIN a few months, possibly on Oct. 12, which is the Spanish people's "Day of the Race," Argentina  and Brazil will celebrate the opening of their International Bridge which spans the Uruguay River between Argentina's Paso de los Libres (Freeman's...
docs.lead_paragraph: WITHIN a few months, possibly on Oct. 12, which is the Spanish people's "Day of the Race," Argentina and Brazil will celebrate the opening of their International Bridge which spans the Uruguay River between Argentina's Paso de los Libres (Freeman's Pass) and Brazil's Uruguayana.
